page.title: 12ST.ANDREWS CHURCH CHEDDAR
page.content: {St. Andrews Church}is a Church of England Church. It was built between 1350 and 1450.In 1480 an extra chapel was added.There have been 49 vicars of Cheddar dating from 1130 to 1985.The present vicar is the{Rev. Denman.}He has been vicar of St.Andrews for twenty eight years.The complete site including the graveyard is five to six acres.The church is very big and is able to hold 450 people.In 1797{Hannah {More}formed the choir.The bells are all dated differently two were added in 1916 and one of them dates from 1573. Some of the church is in need of repair. At the church there are usually seven services a week. The Rev. Denman thinks that the church is extremely beautiful.
